schemes.name: Raitha Yantra Dhare (Farm Machinery Rental Services)
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides farm machinery such as tractors, tillers, power weeders and post-harvest equipment through Custom Hiring Centers at subsidized rental rates.
schemes.benefits: Affordable access to modern farm machinery, reduced cultivation cost and improved productivity.
schemes.eligibility: All registered farmers in Karnataka; priority to small and marginal farmers.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Custom Hiring Centers or Raitha Samparka Kendras.

schemes.name: Subsidy for Purchase of Agricultural Machinery & Implements
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides capital subsidy for purchase of tractors, rotavators, threshers, power tillers and harvesting equipment.
schemes.benefits: Encourages farm mechanization and reduces dependency on manual labour.
schemes.eligibility: Small, marginal and medium farmers as per landholding and income criteria.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through District Agriculture Office or subsidy portal.

schemes.name: Custom Hiring Centers – Establishment Assistance
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides financial assistance to establish machinery rental centers for farmers who do not own equipment.
schemes.benefits: Shared access to machinery, reduced capital burden and improved mechanization coverage.
schemes.eligibility: FPOs, farmer cooperatives, Gram Panchayats and SHG producer groups.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Department of Agriculture or District Level Committees.

schemes.name: Power Tiller & Mini Tractor Subsidy Scheme
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidy for purchase of power tillers and mini tractors suitable for small, hilly and rainfed farms.
schemes.benefits: Improved land preparation efficiency and reduced labour dependency.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers owning small, fragmented, hilly or rainfed landholdings.

schemes.name: Post-Harvest Machinery Assistance – Graders & Cleaners
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture & Horticulture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidy support for seed graders, cleaners, decorticators and small post-harvest processing machinery.
schemes.benefits: Improved produce quality, reduced post-harvest losses and value addition.
schemes.eligibility: Individual farmers, SHGs, FPOs and farmer cooperatives.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through District Agriculture or Horticulture Department.

schemes.name: Horticulture Mechanization & Equipment Subsidy
schemes.department: Department of Horticulture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidy for horticulture tools, sprayers, pruning equipment, harvesting tools and plastic crates.
schemes.benefits: Improved orchard management, harvesting efficiency and reduced post-harvest damage.
